evidence_span: the critical crack size (for instability) of a through-wall crack was known to be well over $5 0 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ for those particular tubes

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk1

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk2

evidence_span: Both sets of specimens contained subsets that were hydrided to a level of 200 μg/g (circumferential hydrides)

evidence_span: Compact specimens were cut from strips of flattened tubing containing 90 μg/g of hydrogen precipitated in the radial orientation

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk2

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk2

evidence_span: Cold-worked Zr-2.5Nb, the alloy now used in all operating CANDU power reactors, has demonstrated a much greater resistance to hydrogen ingress, and a much higher threshold stress for hydride reorientation, than Zircaloy-2

evidence_span: Cold-worked Zr-2.5Nb, the alloy now used in all operating CANDU power reactors, has demonstrated a much greater resistance to hydrogen ingress, and a much higher threshold stress for hydride reorientation, than Zircaloy-2

evidence_span: Initial slope of the ${  f { J } } _ { {  f { R } } }$ curve, dJ/da, versus flow stress, . for Zircaloy-2 containing radial or mixed hydrides

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk7
evidence_span: strengthening factors, such as reduction in temperature, irradiation, and cold work, all lead to significant reductions in ductility

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk7
evidence_span: Irradiation does not have a measurable effect on the ductile-brittle transition temperature

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk7
evidence_span: Circumferential hydride has a measurable, deleterious effect on fracture toughness, even above the temperatures at which fracture occurs under the transverse stress field of the approaching crack

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: An experimental program undertaken by CEA, EDF, and FRAGEMA with the aim of characterizing the fatigue and creep-fatigue behavior of Zircaloy-4 following different annealing treatments (recrystallization, stress relief, etc.) is in progress. The results given in this paper concern only recrystallized material.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Low-cycle fatigue curves and creep behavior laws under high stresses have been established.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Sequential tests of pure fatigue and creep-fatigue were performed.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: The cumulative life fractions at fracture depend on the sequence of loading, stress history, and number of cycles of prestressing.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Miner's rule appears to be conservative with regard to a low-high loading sequence, whereas it is not for the reverse high-low loading sequences.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Fatigue and creep damage are not interchangeable.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Pre-creep improves the fatigue resistance.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Pre-fatigue improves the creep strength so long as the beneficial effect of cyclic hardening overcomes the damaging effect of surface cracking.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: The introduction of a tension hold time into the fatigue cycle slightly increases cyclic hardening and reduces the number of cycles to failure.
property_name: cyclic hardening, number of cycles to failure

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: For hold times of less than 1 h, the sum of fatigue and creep life fractions is close to one.

source_id: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_044_chunk8
evidence_span: Cumulative Fatigue and Creep-Fatigue Damage at 350°C on Recrystallized Zircaloy-4
